001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Delete;
006import androidx.room.Insert;
007import androidx.room.Query;
008import androidx.room.Update;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
012import java.util.Collection;
013import java.util.List;
014
015/**
016 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link User} entity instances. {@code INSERT}
017 */
018@Dao
019public interface UserDao {
020
021  @Insert
022  Single<Long> insert(User user);
023
024  @Insert
025  Single<List<Long>> insert(User... user);
026
027  @Insert
028  Single<List<Long>> insert(Collection<User> users);
029
030  @Update
031  Single<Integer> update(User users);
032
033  @Update
034  Single<Integer> update(User... users);
035
036  @Update
037  Single<Integer> update(Collection<User> users);
038
039  @Delete
040  Single<Integer> delete(User users);
041
042  @Delete
043  Single<Integer> delete(User... users);
044
045  @Delete
046  Single<Integer> delete(Collection<User> users);
047
048  @Query("SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = :id")
049  LiveData<User> select(long id);
050
051  @Query("SELECT * FROM user WHERE oauth_key = :oauthKey")
052  Maybe<User> select(String oauthKey);
053
054  @Query("SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY display_name ASC")
055  LiveData<List<User>> select();
056
057
058}
